response.overview: A case involving drug lords and murder in South Florida takes a personal turn for undercover detectives Sonny Crockett and Ricardo Tubbs. Unorthodox Crockett gets involved romantically with the Chinese-Cuban wife of a trafficker of arms and drugs, while Tubbs deals with an assault on those he loves.
response.tagline: No Law. No Rules. No Order.
response.title: Miami Vice

titles.title: Miami vice - Deux flics à Miami
